name: Nature Sound Museum (Oveyo)
description:
HEADPHONES NEEDED!

We made a project about physical space and how it communicates with the player. So we decided to turn those lights off and let your hearing and little statues help you. Welcome to the NSM made by:

@jaranlopz (Oveyo): Music/SFX Design, Production and Game Developer

@ikerDEV (ikerdi): Blocking and Documentation

@QGAAnimation: Writer and Documentation

Controls:

Hold Left Mouse Click: Pick up statues

Movemente: WASD

ENJOY NSM

P.s: if you are having trouble with the mouse click try full screen mode!
